feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.9: 1-click Retrieval Step: Immediate Expired Message
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • 1-click: Immediately show expired message if push is expired (#2285) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump reviewdog/action-brakeman from 2.12.0 to 2.13.0 (#2291) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.13 to 0.4.14 (#2290) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 (#2289) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.37.0 to 1.38.0 (#2286) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.197.1 to 3.197.2 (#2284) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.41.9

..and go to http://localhost:5100

:link: Useful Links

  • Configuration Documentation
  • API Documentation
  • Docker Hub
  • GitHub
  • Website
  • Twitter
  • Newsletter

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.10: Add Slovak Language Support
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add Slovenský Language Support (#2306) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.39.0 to 0.40.0 (#2305) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.947.0 to 1.948.0 (#2304) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump tilt from 2.3.0 to 2.4.0 (#2303) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump minitest-rails from 7.1.0 to 7.1.1 (#2300) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.152.3 to 1.154.0 (#2299) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.85.0 to 1.86.0 (#2295) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.38.0 to 1.39.0 (#2296) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.946.0 to 1.947.0 (#2293) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump public_suffix from 5.1.1 to 6.0.0 (#2287) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.12: Switch to Rack::Attack for Throttling
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • Switch to Rack::Attack for Throttling (#2324) @pglombardo
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.950.0 to 1.951.0 (#2323) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.39.0 to 1.39.1 (#2320) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump rack from 3.1.4 to 3.1.6 (#2319) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-core from 3.200.0 to 3.201.0 (#2318) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.155.0 to 1.156.0 (#2316) @dependabot

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.14: Add Link to new Docs Portal
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

Password Pusher has a new documentation portal available at:

https://docs.pwpush.com

:rocket: Features

  • Add Documentation Link (#2327) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors
